oai_dc:dc.dcterms:title: Celebration at Independence Hall
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:creator: pdcp_noharvest
Philadelphia Evening Bulletin
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:description: Photo shows pennants and streamers hanging from clock and bell tower of Independence Hall and Commodore John Barry monument. There is a tent and loud speaker system immediately in front of Independence Hall entrance. Note dirigible in left upper quadrant of photo.
This is a test record from the PDCP Metadata Team. Please do not reference this item for research. Thank you.

oai_dc:dc.dcterms:title: Micky Dolenz of the Monkees with the Temple owl mascot and a Temple University football player
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:description: Micky Dolenz identified from other photos of the Monkees rock group. The Monkees played a concert at a Temple University football game. The date of the concert/football game was found to be 1986 through research in newspaper databases.
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:subject: Football players
Mascots

oai_dc:dc.dcterms:title: Russell Conwell and others at the dedication of Conwell Hall
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:description: "Participants in the dedication of Conwell Hall in January of 1924 included (from the left) Josiah Penniman, President of the University of Pennsylvania; the Rev. Floyd Tomkins, rector of Holy Trinity Protestant Episcopal Church; President Conwell; Charles E. Beury, Trustee and Chairman of the Building Committee; Laura Carnell, Associate President; Wilmer Krusen, Vice President of the University and Philadelphia's Director of Health."
This is a test record from the PDCP Metadata Team. Please do not reference this item for research. Thank you.
Test local rights and DPLA rights.
